tagline.title: WEST BALI TOUR IS BALI FULL DAY TOURS PACKAGE TO ENJOY EXPLORE PLACES OF INTEREST IN THE WESTERN OF BALI ISLAND
tagline.text: WEST BALI TOUR IS BALI FULL DAY TOURS PACKAGE TO ENJOY EXPLORE PLACES OF INTEREST IN THE WESTERN OF BALI ISLAND
tagline.html: WEST BALI TOUR IS BALI FULL DAY TOURS PACKAGE TO ENJOY EXPLORE PLACES OF INTEREST IN THE WESTERN OF BALI ISLAND

description.text: West Bali Tour is part of Bali Full Day Tour Packages to explore the beauty places of interest in western of Bali Islands, western Bali also offer interesting site to visit during your holiday, for those want to explore each area in Bali, this is good choice to know more western area from temple, unique tree and beautiful rice terrace. The journey is begin upon our friendly tour driver pick up at hotel by give very welcome smile. It is a good opportunity to find out more about tourist destinations in the west area, and this tour is purely to the west area of ​​​​the island of Bali. The journey is begin upon our friendly tour driver pick up at hotel by give very welcome smile in the morning and go directly to the rambut siwi temple to see the beauty and uniqueness of this rambut siwi temple, continue to dharma giri vihara to see the beauty of the sleeping buddha statue that is here, proceed to the restaurant to enjoy lunch with Indonesian food, after lunch the journey continues to visit bunut bolong to see its uniqueness which has a hole in the middle of a tree with a large enough diameter and can be passed by a car, continued to see a very wide expanse of rice fields with a very amazing green view Our professional tour driver leads your West Bali Tour to the right places to visit and offers the wide information about all tourist sites including your questions. Our comfortable car with fully air-conditioning is to keep your Bali West Tour more enjoyable while our Bali Tour driver is always fully care of your safety and ensure your West Bali Tour is memorable one. Below is short description places of interest will be visit during West Bali Tour.

placeLinks: West Bali Tour Price and Inclusion

title.title: Rambut Siwi Temple | West Bali Tour

image.title: Rambut Siwi Temple | West Bali Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Rambut Siwi Temple is one of the biggest Hindu Temples in Bali located in West Bali Islands. It is a beautiful Hindu shrine set in the cliff bank with wide Indian Ocean just in front of the temple. The Main temple located in cliff bank and and blessed by the breath taking view of the Indian ocean. This temples owns the representative temple building which is set beside main road of Denpasar to Gilimanuk. Name of Rambut Siwi is contain of a relic which is a lock of sage's hair (rambut) that is venerated (siwi). The Temple has been renovated and moved to the top of hill for better location of worshiping to the god, Rambut Siwi Temple is supported by the local resident including the maintenance and ceremony.

button.title: Rambut Siwi Temple | West Bali Tour

title.title: Dharma Giri Vihara | West Bali Tour

image.title: Dharma Giri Vihara | West Bali Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Dharma Giri Vihara is a monastery located in the west part of Bali islands with the uniqueness of the largest Buddha statue in a sleeping position which is painted in pure white color which is very beautiful to the eye. A very spectacular sight, which has become one of the most favorite tourist destinations in the western area of ​​​​the island of Bali. Maybe not many people know about this monastery, because its original purpose was as a place of worship for Buddhists who were around this place. Since the existence of this sleeping Buddha statue, many tourists come here to see the uniqueness of this Buddha putang. With such a beautiful design, it will spoil your eyes to see the majesty of Buddha

button.title: Dharma Giri Vihara | West Bali Tour

image.title: Bunut Bolong | West Bali Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bunut Bolong is a giant tree that is very old and is sanctified by the locals with the uniqueness that in the middle of the tree there is a hole or aisle whose diameter can be used for passing vehicles through the hole and is located on the road, where to go to this village we will through this tree and through this tree from under it. Local people believe that this tree is centuries old which they can see from the very old tree structure and this tree has been around for generations of local residents living around this bunut bolong tree. A natural phenomenon that you must visit while on vacation in Bali and see the uniqueness of this very unique and very beautiful and religious bunut bolong tree.

A natural phenomenon that you must visit while on vacation in Bali and see the uniqueness of this very unique and very beautiful and religious bunut bolong tree.

title.title: Pupuan Rice Terrace | West Bali Tour

image.title: Pupuan Rice Terrace | West Bali Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Pupuan Rice Terrace is beautiful rice terrace located in the western part of Bali, a place to fill your eyes with awesome memories of great landscape accompanied by no one other than the friendly local farmers. Pupuan Rice Terrace is best enjoyed early in the morning or late in the afternoon on a clear day. When rainy, fog usually follows the rain and obscures the whole village. With the arrival of the planting season, the local cultivators start plowing their fields adding traditional culture to the scenery. The rice fields in Pupuan village are very beautiful, here on the left and right of the road you can see a vast expanse of very beautiful rice fields, many tourists come here to just enjoy the green rice in a large area

price.title: West Bali Tour Price :
price.content:
West Bali Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of West Bali Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 750,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 1,000,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,250,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 800,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Lunch Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

content.event: Visit Rambut Siwi Temple

Visit Pupuan Rice Terrace

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
